channel.title: How to make a starfield type thing in GIMP
channel.description:
i will be teaching you how to make something awesome using GIMP
Step 1, make a new document or w/e you call it and make sure the backround is black, then go to filter-noise-scatter HSV and have the numbers like this
Holdness: 4 hue: 0 saturation: 0 value: 190
and click ok.
Step 2 go to colors brightness and contrast and set these values -46 / +105 (this step you can choose your own that are close to this to make it look better)
Step 3 make a new layer and name it nebula, then go to filters-render-plasma then choose any plasme you want and have the turbulence anywhere from 2-3 i picked 2.6 then go to layers-colors-desaturate and choose that then gaussian blue it with 15 px
then in your layers dialouge make sure you set the nebula to divide.
step 4 make a new layer and put it under nebula i suggest naming it stars or something like that then go to filters-light effects-supernova and add a few of these
Step 5 mess around with the color balance a bit to your liking.
The End
this is my best outcome after making this tutorial and following it so far: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/760/nebulaqu0.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b][size=30pt]Please post your outcomes![/size][/b]

Nice i like it alot better now that you added another step looks like it has more contrast!!!

I live in the United States of America and i go to a school called brebeuf its a private School!

http://www.brebeuf.org/

Also i told you I’m sick and i just threw up. TALK TO ME LATER and stop making fun of me plz!~

if your so smart how come your a moparscaper?
[/quote]

I love codding java and some day soon(well next year…) hope to take java classes and change the way moparscape stands… Also I have nothing better to right now but post on these forums. Other days when I’m feeling better i hang with my friends and I haven’t been on moparscape for awhile do to i got hacked. Oh well I like your work and i hope you keep posting your tutorials… I just got gimp and it looks cool! Would you post some more tutorials?[/quote]
maybe after you follow this tutorial and post your outcome i’ll make more.

item.title: How to make a starfield type thing in GIMP
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:17, topic:154152”]Yeah, I like it, but I think the flashes are a bit too bright. Got a tut to make them less bright?
But, it doesn’t look like space anymore, it looks like, something O.o[/quote]
well, you can make them smaller and less spokes which would in theory, make them less bright, plus if you mess around with the color levels and stuff you could make it darker by messing around with the alpha channel.

Read full topic
